_aChangeLog.text: More Lasers on ULTIMATE, reduced the width of the lasers.
New Human Items, LaserGun, Radioactive AK-47 is added.
New Stage CORRUPTED is added. Map now has 7 stages in total.
Fixed Safe spot on dimensional permanently. RNG made easier.
New Holding spots for Humans are added.
Human Items will spawn randomly throughout the map.
Unnecessary things are removed. Instead replaced by better.
New Banner for contest Winners are added.
It's better if you play the map with NEMESIS MODE in the ratio 1:4.

_sText:
**This is an improved version of the beta version of this Map ze_eerie_escape_b1**

Map Contains:

7 Stages + Zombie Mode. (8 Total)
Stage-1: STATIC
Stage-2: SONIC
Stage-3: HYPER
Stage-4: ULTIMATE
Stage-5: CORRUPTED
Stage-6: MYSTIC
Stage-7: DIMENSIONAL
Map Also Contains Items (6 for Humans, 3 for Zombies)

Human Items

  • Tecquila Shotgun
  • EERIE Shield
  • Teleporter
  • LaserGun
  • Radioactive AK-47
  • JetPack.

Zombie Items
  • Zombie Killer
  • Zombie Invisibility
  • Zombie Laser

Map Info: 
On First 7 Stages, Humans have to survive 100 seconds, then they will be teleported to final destination and dodge the Lasers. (5 Stages contains Lasers and 6th has Cube RNG). Overall Map is made for fun and doesn't contain any real tryhard.

NOTE
**If Map contains bugs, just inform me. You are not allowed to edit and re-upload this map.**

** Map Ideas from NemesisNiDE Laser,Mako Reactor, Luccidreams. **
** Special Thanks to Hobbitten for motivating/bug fixes/cfgs. **
** Map Tester: HA **

Final Update
v3 will be the final version and this map will have no more updates. It was a small prototype map made for fun. And I'm planning to move on and work on my bigger projects.
Edit: Reason for v3_5? People wanted a new version.
